title: Bash On Ubuntu On Windows must support Extended Attributes
body: According to https://blogs.msdn.microsoft.com/wsl/2016/06/15/wsl-file-system-support/, there is already support for some extended attribute and mappings to NTFS ones for some system ones.

comments.body:
Please, please, please, do not come up with yet another xattr mangling scheme. Please get in touch with NTFS-3g and Samba, and read my DC-2011 paper about it:
http://dcevents.dublincore.org/IntConf/dc-2011/paper/view/53
